name: Don't mess with crabbo!
description:
Sometimes it  happens that you have to fight for something and you don’t know if this battle is necessary. 

Don't drink a lot, love crabs and eat healthy food! 


This game appeared thanks to the union of  talented people, crab rave and english language looking  like meme!  

development: spectrophobia

music:  ETRIGAN

art: Spookyboy, Torri Feiiji

Special thanks to crab rave for inspiration!
